pr_title: Refresh endpoints when the weight is changed in `HealthCheckedEndpointGroup`

timeline.message:
Refresh endpoints when the weight is changed in `HealthCheckedEndpointGroup`
Motivation:
Should reflect the change of endpoints in `HealthCheckedEndpointGroup` even when the weight of an endpoint is changed.

Modification:
- Refresh endpoints in `HealthCheckedEndpointGroup` when the weight of an endpoint is changed.

Result:
- The endpoints of `HealthCheckedEndpointGroup` are updated when the weight of an endpoint is changed.

timeline.author: ikhoon

replies.bodyText: What happens newSelectedEndpoints has more endpoints?
replies.author: minwoox
ikhoon

replies.bodyText:
If newSelectedEndpoints has more endpoints than current endpoints we should add the newly added endpoints.
So we should do this as well:
newSelectedEndpoints.containsAll(contexts.keySet())
which iterates another for loop.
Most of the time, the endpoints will be changed so I think it's useless to check if just the weight is changed.
We will be going to notice that anyway. 😄
